00009 #if !defined(Apc_SsNotification_hpp)
00010 #define Apc_SsNotification_hpp
00011 
00012 
00013 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00014 #include <Auxiliary/BitField.hpp>
00015 
00016 
00017 /*  ========================================================================
00018     Supplementary Service Status  [GSM 09.02, 14.7.4], (msap_msg_mn.pr: 966)
00019     SS-Notification containing the following information:
00020     bits 87654: 00000 unused
00021     bit 3: Call is forwarded indication to calling subscriber
00022     bit 2: Call is forwarded indication to forwarding subscriber
00023     bit 1: Call is forwarded indication to forwarded-to subscriber
00024     coding defined in [GSM 04.80, 4.4.2]
00025     ========================================================================*/
00027 class SsNotification {
00028     public:
00030         SsNotification(UINT8 incoming_byte = 0) : m_ss_notification(incoming_byte) {};
00031 
00033         UINT8 GetByte() const { return m_ss_notification; }
00035         BOOLEAN IsForwardedToCallingSubscriber() const { return m_ss_notification & 0x04; }
00037         BOOLEAN IsForwardedToForwardingSubscriber() const { return m_ss_notification & 0x02; }
00039         BOOLEAN IsForwardedToForwardedToSubscriber() const { return m_ss_notification & 0x01; }
00040 
00041     private:
00042         UINT8 m_ss_notification;
00043 };
00044 
00045 
00046 #endif  // Apc_SsNotification_hpp
